PerfectNetExp.abs: 用英语怎么说_百度知道 ... soccer commentator 足球评论员 Groundsman 修理草皮人员 Ballboys - 捡球者.
场地 - English translation - bab.la... ... 距球门最远的场地 backcourt 场地管理员 groundsman (电影)外景拍摄场地 location.

entry.tran: 运动场地管理员；公园管理员
entry.def: A groundsman is a person whose job is to look after a park or sports ground.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who maintains the grounds (of an estate or park or athletic field)

auth_sentence.content: Just before the start of play today, the groundsman mowed the pitch.
auth_sentence.res_content: Just before the start of play today, the groundsman mowed the pitch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Just before the start of play today, the groundsman mowed the pitch.

auth_sentence.content: Halfway through our weekend in Royal Tunbridge Wells we wandered into a public park and were shouted at by the groundsman.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Halfway through our weekend in Royal Tunbridge Wells we wandered into a public park and were shouted at by the groundsman.

auth_sentence.content: "There's a groundsman up on a ladder behind me trimming a tree," Cotterill began.
